item.title: AI Memory and Context Windows: Why AI Forgets Things
item.description: Human notices AI forgot something from earlier in conversation. Vector explains context windows and token limits. Kai monitors conversation length and detects overflow risks. Recurse investigates why context is limited. Learn how AI memory works, practical solutions for context limits, and when to start new conversations.
